channel.title: Peter Braid
channel.description: Recent news about Peter Braid, from openparliament.ca.

item.description: Great discussion today about development goals with Senegalese Minister of Health, Awa Marie Coll Seck. @ResultsCda http://t.co/sy11zqKlSp

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Promoting safe hygiene practices to a group of women under a shady tree somewhere near Thies, Senegal. @ResultsCda http://t.co/E5BKcrjQ6z

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Vitamin A supplements supplied by Canada through @micronutrient save the lives of millions of children in Africa. http://t.co/jIl9HQqvoq

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Canada supports @UNICEFAfrica delivered community based education in Senegal to promote good health and hygiene. http://t.co/7d40RVTlyQ

item.title: Mentioned by Marketwire (press release)
item.description:
REMINDER / Media Advisory : Government of Canada Supports Innovation and ...
WATERLOO, ONTARIO--(Marketwired - June 24, 2013) - Peter Braid, Member of Parliament for Kitchener-Waterloo, on behalf of the Honourable Gary Goodyear, Minister of State for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario (FedDev Ontario), will make an announcement to support innovation and entrepreneurship in Waterloo. MP Braid will participate in a photo opportunity and will be available to answer questions from the media following the event. Please note that all details are subject to ...
